name: Doodle's Decision
description:
Just uploaded my first game.

========================================================

Player Movement Keys: 

'a' = go left, 'd' = go right, 'space' = jump

========================================================

It is still in development, so there may be bugs. Would like some feedback :)

All art has been created by me using Autodesk Sketchbook and Flip-A-Clip on my Note8. 

Thank you!
